tab.name: Options
tab.option: Select the features to be calculated. One feature does not necessarily add exactly one additional plane. Some might add more, also depending on the selection of parameters. A more detailed description of the features and the parameters can be found at http://fiji.sc/Trainable_Weka_Segmentation#Training_features.
Sets the size of the Membrane Projections Filter.
Sets the thickness of the Membrane Projections Filter
Sets the minimum and maximum of the Blur strength for Gaussian related filters. Sets the minimal and maximal filter size for other filters.
If checked, the features will be calculated in a multithreaded, i.e. parallel, manner.

The label of the dimension to be added to the input images. For further processing please make sure that the dimension label is available in the according dialogs by adding it in the preferences of the Image Processing Extension.

ports.outPort: The feature images. Please note that normalization might be necessary (e.g. in the Table Cell View) to make to feature images visible.
